title: Fishing Village Poem
marks: Signature, Marks, and Seal L edge center
description: three full lines of expressive calligraphy; shorter line at far L with signature; light greyish-blue paper; rectangular intaglio stamp URC; large square intaglio stamp LLC; large square relief stamp LLC
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
